summary: Polynesia is a region in the Pacific Ocean with over 1,000 islands. It includes places like Hawaii, New Zealand, and many islands in the southern Pacific. The people who live here are called Polynesians and share similar languages, culture, and beliefs. They are known for their skilled navigation using stars. The name "Polynesia" was first used in 1756, and it helps identify this unique group of islands and their inhabitants.
title: Polynesia
